Upgrading the annotation editor

If you are using the web-based annotation editor in your application, the following steps are required to update it to the redesigned version shipping with Publisher 9:

  1. Copy templates/pages/annotate.html, the templates/pages/annotations and resources/css/annotate.css subdirectory to the same location in your app

  2. Also copy the directory resources/scripts/annotations/ to the corresponding location

  3. If you did not change the annotation ODD to match your own requirements, you may also want to copy odd/annotations.odd from TEI Publisher 9 into resources/odd/ of you app

  4. To update the HTML page for annotations, it is best to use the version from TEI Publisher 9 and copy over the sections you customized. While the Publisher 9 version may look very different on first sight, the relevant, user-customizable parts have not changed much:

    • copy any customized toolbar buttons (class annotation-action) into the corresponding header element in the Publisher 9 version

    • in the same way copy modified form controls (class annotation-form). In the new version those appear further down in the HTML, but still look the same

    • copy element pb-authority-lookup, including your custom authoritiy definitions
